title: Samstag Nacht bis Sonntag Morgen
notes: 1960 Karel Reisz British kitchen sink realism with Albert Finney as rebellious factory worker - seminal New Wave film

title: Samsung und Delilah (Australien)
notes: 2009 Warwick Thornton Australian film about Indigenous youth in central Australia - typo: Samson not Samsung, Caméra d'Or winner

title: Savages – Im Auge des Kartells
notes: 2012 Oliver Stone crime thriller about California marijuana growers vs Mexican cartel with Taylor Kitsch, Blake Lively, Aaron Taylor-Johnson

title: Schmetterlinge (D '1987/88)
notes: 1987-1988 German TV series - distinctive nostalgic drama about 1950s Germany

title: Schöne Müllersfrau (Die_IT ´55_S. Loren_/Trailer)
notes: 1955 Mario Camerini Italian comedy with Sophia Loren, Vittorio De Sica - distinctive early Loren role
